lines.text: I've just come from Mexico, General. Rodriguez is dead.
He was devoured by a shark in a telephone booth, General.

We found an Albanian Interpreter. However, he speaks only Romanian. So we had to get a Romanian. But he speaks only Serbian. The Serb speaks only Russian. The Russian only Czech. I, fortunately, speak Czech.
Did they ever find the shark that devoured Rodriguez?
Yes, it turned up in a canning factory.
My hollow tooth. I've lost my cyanide capsule. That's never happened to me before when I kissed a woman. Good lord, where is it?
